verses.verse: Awake, <S%H5782><s%> awake; <S%H5782><s%> put <S%H3847><s%> on your strength, <S%H5797><s%> O Zion; <S%H6726><s%> put <S%H3847><s%> on your beautiful <S%H8597><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> city: <S%H5892><s%> for from now on <S%H6258><s%> there shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into you the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> and the unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

Shake <S%H5287><s%> yourself from the dust; <S%H6083><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> down, O Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> loose <S%H6605><s%> yourself from the bands <S%H4147><s%> of your neck, <S%H6677><s%> O captive <S%H7628><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> You have sold <S%H4376><s%> yourselves for nothing; <S%H2600><s%> and you shall be redeemed <S%H1350><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> money. <S%H3701><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> aforetime <S%H7223><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> them without <S%H657><s%> cause. <S%H657><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, what <S%H4100><s%> have I here, <S%H6311><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that my people <S%H5971><s%> is taken <S%H3947><s%> away for nothing? <S%H2600><s%> they that rule <S%H4910><s%> over them make them to howl, <S%H3213><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and my name <S%H8034><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is blasphemed. <S%H5006><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> my name: <S%H8034><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> they shall know in that day <S%H3117><s%> that I am he that does speak: <S%H1696><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is I.

How <S%H4100><s%> beautiful <S%H4998><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him that brings <S%H1319><s%> good <S%H1319><s%> tidings, <S%H1319><s%> that publishes <S%H8085><s%> peace; <S%H7965><s%> that brings <S%H1319><s%> good <S%H1319><s%> tidings <S%H1319><s%> of good, <S%H2896><s%> that publishes <S%H8085><s%> salvation; <S%H3444><s%> that said <S%H559><s%> to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Your God <S%H430><s%> reigns! <S%H4427><s%>

Your watchmen <S%H6822><s%> shall lift <S%H5375><s%> up the voice; <S%H6963><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> shall they sing: <S%H7442><s%> for they shall see <S%H7200><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> to eye, <S%H5869><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

Break <S%H6476><s%> forth into joy, sing <S%H7442><s%> together, you waste <S%H2723><s%> places of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has comforted <S%H5162><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> he has redeemed <S%H1350><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has made bare <S%H2834><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Depart <S%H5493><s%> you, depart <S%H5493><s%> you, go <S%H3318><s%> you out from there, <S%H8033><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> no <S%H408><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing; go <S%H3318><s%> you out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of her; be you clean, <S%H1305><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

For you shall not go <S%H3318><s%> out with haste, <S%H2649><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> by flight: <S%H4499><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; and the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be your rear guard. <S%H622><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall deal prudently, <S%H7919><s%> he shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> and extolled, <S%H5375><s%> and be very <S%H3966><s%> high. <S%H1361><s%>

As many <S%H7227><s%> were astonished <S%H8074><s%> at you; his visage <S%H4758><s%> was so marred <S%H4893><s%> more than any man, <S%H376><s%> and his form <S%H8389><s%> more than the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men: <S%H120><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall he sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> shall shut <S%H7092><s%> their mouths <S%H6310><s%> at him: for that which <S%H834><s%> had not been told <S%H5608><s%> them shall they see; <S%H7200><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> they had not heard <S%H8085><s%> shall they consider. <S%H995><s%>
